text: Taylor Hardwick (July 15, 1925 â€“ September 27, 2014) was an American architect, interior designer, filmmaker, and educator. He designed hundreds of buildings throughout northeast Florida, predominantly in and near the city of Jacksonville. Hardwick died in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida from cancer, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Tribute website to Taylor Hardwick *American Institute of Architects Jacksonville Chapter Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American architects Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Educators from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:Educators from Philadelphia
title: Taylor Hardwick
